page.title: List of programs broadcast by The CW Television Network

revisions.rev:
[[File:The CW.svg|200px|thumb|right|The CW's current logo]] The following is a list of programs which have been or are soon to be broadcast on [[The CW Television Network]]. Programs carried over from [[UPN]] and [[The WB Television Network]], are noted. To date, the only remaining programs that are left that survived the merger and being canceled are ''[[One Tree Hill (TV series)|One Tree Hill]]'' and ''[[Supernatural (TV series)|Supernatural]]'' from The WB, and ''[[America's Next Top Model]]'' from UPN. However, ''One Tree'' will be airing its final season in the middle of the 2011â2012 television season.
==Currently broadcast by The CW== ===Dramas=== <!-- In order of air date --> * ''[[One Tree Hill (TV series)|One Tree Hill]]'' (2006â2012) (The WB, 2003â2006) * ''[[Supernatural (TV series)|Supernatural]]'' (2006âpresent) (The WB, 2005â2006) * ''[[Gossip Girl]]'' (2007âpresent) * ''[[90210 (TV series)|90210]]'' (2008âpresent) * ''[[The Vampire Diaries]]'' (2009âpresent) * ''[[Nikita (TV series)|Nikita]]'' (2010âpresent) * ''[[Ringer (TV series)|Ringer]]'' (2011âpresent) * ''[[The Secret Circle (TV series)|The Secret Circle]]'' (2011âpresent) * ''[[Hart of Dixie]]'' (2011âpresent)
===Reality/unscripted=== <!-- In order of air date --> * ''[[America's Next Top Model]]'' (2006âpresent) (UPN, 2003â2006)
===Daytime=== <!-- In order of air date --> * ''[[Lifechangers]]'' (2011âpresent)<ref>{{cite web|author=Kimberly Nordyke |url=http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/news/cw-orders-dr-drew-show-70239 |title=CW Orders Dr. Drew Show for Afternoon Block |publisher=The Hollywood Reporter |date=2011-01-11 |accessdate=2011-07-07}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|author=The Official Dr. Drew Lifechangers Twitter |url=http://twitter.com/#!/DrDrewLCTV/status/89110543562055680 |title=Lifechangers official Twitter reveals the release date of Lifechangers |date=2011-07-07 |accessdate=2011-07-07}}</ref>
===Saturday morning (under the ''[[Toonzai]]'' banner)=== * ''[[Magi-Nation]]'' * ''[[Sonic X]]'' * ''[[Yu-Gi-Oh!]]'' * ''[[Dragon Ball Z Kai]]'' * ''[[Tai Chi Chasers]]'' * ''[[Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal]]''
